did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Cornell Plantations records, [ca. 1945]-1999
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Newspaper clippings, brochures, drawings for proposed buildings and gardens, journals and photographs. Oversized maps, plans and drawings. Also, videotape of the "The 150th Birthday Celebration of Beebe Lake," May 1, 1988.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Newspaper clippings, brochures, drawings for proposed buildings and gardens, and photographs. Also, videotape of the "The 150th Birthday Celebration of Beebe Lake," May 1, 1988.
Includes journals kept by gardeners from 1956-1999.
Now includes oversized maps and drawings of gardens and natural areas supervised by Cornell Plantations.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Cornell Plantations. Records, #34-4-2302. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIALS
relatedmaterial.p: See also the video A Journey Through Time and Nature, Cornell Plantations Path and Robert E. Jones Cornell Plantations papers, #34-4-4130.

arrangement.head: SERIES LIST
arrangement.p:
Series I. General files and diaries
Boxes 1-4

Series II. Oversized plans, maps and drawings
Mapcase Folders 1-15
